page.title: 03MY DAD'S JOB.
page.content: My dad works at{Steetly Magnestite.}He wears a green overall,a helmet,and ir_ on tipped boots to protect his toes.He is responsible for his shift.He checks things like the kilns or adjusts them to the right temperature,and bakes mat _erials with which they make bricks at {Nottingham.}He checks three settling tanks where they mix{magnesia}with {water,dolime,and dolmite.}There is one sea watertank and four fresh ones.Once he fell in a tank and got out just in time and once he got his hand caught in a conveyor belt.He makes sure that the plant is working at full capacity. When he is working days,there is a canteen open but on nights he takes food like soup and cake. After work he has a shower.On days he comes back at 4:30 p.m and he also works,10 to 8, 3 to 11.When he comes home he is tired and he goes to bed. JONATHAN age 9.
